name: Project.99_1905
description:
Gather every month. Make experimental games. Pack them all. And sell it for 0.99 USD. This month we made 2 games.

[Moving Folks] by Jeawon Yoo, Sun Park, Jooeun Hwang

There are some folks in Alexanderplatz video. So find them.

[Audio survivor] by Jooeun Hwang

Survive as long as you can by avoiding weird sounds.
You are in the 'stereo audio hell'.
